name: debounce
description: Creates a debounced version of a function that waits for a specified delay after the last invocation before executing.

name: throttle
description: Creates a throttled version of a function that limits the rate of execution to a specified interval.

name: deepClone
description: Creates a deep copy of an object, including nested objects and arrays.

name: capitalize
description: Converts the first character of a string to uppercase.

name: formatDate
description: Formats a Date object into a string based on the specified format.

name: shuffleArray
description: Shuffles the elements of an array randomly.

name: groupBy
description: Groups an array of objects by a specified key, creating an object with grouped arrays as values.

name: flattenArray
description: Flattens a nested array into a single-level array.

name: isEmpty
description: Checks if an object or array is empty.

name: parseQueryString
description: Parses the query string parameters from a URL and returns them as an object.

name: sortByKey
description: Sorts an array of objects based on the values of a specified key.

name: calculateAge
description: Calculates the age based on a given birth date.

name: isPalindrome
description: Checks if a string is a palindrome.

name: validateEmail
description: Validates if a given string is a valid email address.

name: localStorageUtil
description: An object containing utility functions to simplify interactions with the browser's localStorage.

name: fetchJson
description: Fetches JSON data from a URL and handles common error cases.

name: debounceResize
description: Calls a function when the window resize event stops, preventing rapid multiple invocations.

name: generateUUID
description: Generates a universally unique identifier (UUID).

name: truncateText
description: Truncates a string to a specified maximum length and adds ellipses if necessary.

name: validatePassword
description: Validates if a password meets common security criteria.

name: parseJSON
description: Parses a JSON string and returns the corresponding JavaScript object. Handles potential parsing errors.

name: formatCurrency
description: Formats a numeric value as a currency string with the specified currency code.

name: countOccurrences
description: Counts the number of occurrences of a specific item in an array.

name: getRandomNumber
description: Generates a random integer between a specified minimum and maximum value.

name: deepMerge
description: Deeply merges two objects, combining their properties and nested objects.

name: countWords
description: Counts the number of words in a given string.

name: calculateBMI
description: Calculates the Body Mass Index (BMI) based on weight (in kilograms) and height (in meters).

name: calculateDistance
description: Calculates the distance between two points in a two-dimensional space.

name: camelCase
description: Converts a string to camel case (e.g., 'hello world' becomes 'helloWorld').

name: reverseArray
description: Reverses the order of elements in an array.

name: getUniqueValues
description: Returns an array containing only the unique values from the input array.

name: capitalizeWords
description: Converts the first letter of each word in a string to uppercase.

name: timeAgo
description: Converts a given date into a human-readable 'time ago' format (e.g., '2 hours ago').

name: localStorageUtil.getItem
description: Retrieves a value from the browser's localStorage based on a specified key.

name: localStorageUtil.setItem
description: Sets a value in the browser's localStorage with a specified key.

name: localStorageUtil.removeItem
description: Removes a value from the browser's localStorage using a specified key.

name: detectMobileDevice
description: Detects if the current device is a mobile device.

name: scrollToTop
description: Scrolls the page to the top smoothly when invoked.

name: calculateFactorial
description: Calculates the factorial of a given positive integer.

name: arrayChunk
description: Splits an array into chunks of a specified size.

name: matchArrayElements
description: Returns an array of common elements found in two arrays.

name: swapArrayElements
description: Swaps the positions of two elements in an array.

name: uniqueIdGenerator
description: Generates a unique identifier based on a specified prefix and a counter.

name: sumArray
description: Calculates the sum of all elements in an array.

name: averageArray
description: Calculates the average value of elements in an array.

name: removeDuplicates
description: Removes duplicate values from an array.
